I know it's easier to communicate the concept as saying photosynthesis arose as a single mutation, but that's biologically inaccurate. It may have evolved once, in a single lineage, but it was the culmination of the many mutations that it takes to produce the functional cellular machinery that harvests the energy from photons of a particular wavelength to strip electrons from water molecules.

This is snake oil fiction being sold as science and it's disgusting.  The earth has never had an oxygen free (reduced) atmosphere, that's another fiction being sold as science.  While photosynthesis is ONE source of free oxygen, it is certainly not the ONLY source of free oxygen.  Oxygen is continually created in the upper atmosphere as cosmic rays strike the Ozone layer.  Perhaps you should change the name to the fairy tale channel.
